process.name: Encapsulate Digital Object and its Metadata
process.description: Atomic process that encapsulate a digital object and its metadata together in a package of a specific format

inputSlots.name: InputSlot Digital Material
inputSlots.description: Input slot corresponding to the digital object

inputSlots.name: InputSlot Metadata
inputSlots.description: Input slot corresponding to the metadata

inputSlots.name: InputSlot Package Format
inputSlots.description: Input slot corresponding to the package format used to encapsulate the digital object and its metadata

outputSlots.name: OutputSlot Package
outputSlots.description: Output slot corresponding to the package resulting of encapsulate a digital object and its metadata
